about_subtitle: Company formation, accounting, certified translations, bank account opening, licensing, legal support, and full administrative assistance — fast, reliable, and fully tailored to your needs
service_formation_text: Company Formation (s.r.o.) — Complete Service Package. We prepare all documents required for establishing a company, guide you through every step, and handle all legal procedures. Fast, transparent and error-free incorporation.
service_documents_text: Complete document preparation for company registration. We collect all necessary documentation, prepare applications, ensure compliance with legal requirements, and manage submissions to the official registry.
service_licenses_text: Obtaining business licenses and permits. We arrange trade licenses, special permits, and all documentation required for compliant business activity in the Czech Republic. Fast and professional assistance.
service_representation_text: Representation in public institutions. We handle administrative procedures at trade offices, financial authorities, immigration offices, social offices, and other institutions. No need for you to attend in person.
service_translations_text: Certified and court-approved translations. Official translations for government offices, banks, courts, and notaries. All documents are translated and certified by authorized sworn translators.
service_bank_text: Opening personal and corporate bank accounts. We prepare the required documents, assist during the bank visit, and help you choose the most suitable banking conditions. Cooperation with major Czech banks.
service_realestate_text: Legal support for real estate transactions. We review properties, prepare agreements, coordinate negotiations, and ensure safe and legally sound property acquisition. Full assistance throughout the transaction.
service_accounting_text: Full accounting support. We provide bookkeeping, prepare financial statements, handle VAT submissions, control deadlines, and help optimize your tax obligations. Reliable and confidential accounting for businesses and freelancers.
form_description: Please use the form below to contact us. Enter your name, email, and message and we will get back to you shortly.
proposal_item_apostille: Document apostille of personal and corporate documents for official use in the Czech Republic and abroad.
proposal_item_databox: Datová schránka setup. Application preparation and full assistance in opening a datová schránka, including client presence.
proposal_item_bank: Bank account opening support. Assistance with opening personal and corporate bank accounts in Czech banks, with required client presence.
proposal_item_power: Service power of attorney. Preparation of a power of attorney for full service support, notarized at the client’s consulate if required.

reviews_subtitle: We provide clear and structured support at every stage of our cooperation. Below you will find essential information about how we communicate, formalize agreements, and stay connected throughout the entire service process.
reviews_questions_text: Feel free to ask any questions — we are ready to clarify all details, discuss the cooperation process, and provide clear, comprehensive information.
reviews_agreement_text: We prepare a personalized agreement for each client. Pricing is calculated individually and depends on the scope, complexity, and specific requirements of your business.
reviews_contact_text: Call us or submit your request through the contact form. Please indicate the purpose of your inquiry and key details about your company so we can respond accurately.
